[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding_tablet=”50px|0|50px|0″ custom_padding_phone=”” transparent_background=”off” padding_mobile=”off” make_fullwidth=”off” use_custom_width=”off” width_unit=”on” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_fullwidth_slider _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_slide heading=”The project 1Planet4All ” use_text_overlay=”off” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” background_enable_color=”on” background_image=”https://www.convergences.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/10/27018-scaled.jpg” background_enable_image=”on” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_transition=”on”][/et_pb_slide][/et_pb_fullwidth_slider][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

The 1Planet4All project, led by Youth We Can! for Convergences, is part of the DEAR (Development Education and Awareness Raising) programme funded by the European Commission. It is implemented by a consortium of 14 organisations in 12 EU Member States.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://www.convergences.org/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/Carroussel-YWC-site-45-x-50-in-65-x-40-in-70-x-20-in-2.png” title_text=”Carroussel YWC site (45 x 50 in) (65 x 40 in) (70 x 20 in)” align=”center” force_fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Its main goals are:

  • Raising awareness about climate change among young people (15-35 years old);
  • Strengthening their capacities and equip them to act;
  • Supporting their initiatives.

Within this framework, activities of various sizes are planned throughout metropolitan France, alongside extensive communication actions.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#ffffff” custom_padding_tablet=”50px|0|50px|0″ custom_padding_phone=”” transparent_background=”off” padding_mobile=”off” make_fullwidth=”off” use_custom_width=”off” width_unit=”on” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_margin=”||-2px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

To find out more, please contact us:

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”mailto:lorelei.ursenbach@convergences.org” button_text=”Lorelei URSENBACH” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.24.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#112f4b” button_border_color=”#112f4b” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
